website_summaries.verdict: Modern design and durable quality make these shelves stand out.
pros: Consumers like the contemporary look and easy installation of these shelves
Many report these hold up well over time and provide an overall beautiful look that enhances living spaces
cons: A few felt they were smaller than expected, and occasionally orders arrived with missing or damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: Love this unique design
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present and love it! Easy to install and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dobson

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This shelf it's self is very cheaply made and is very flimsy, the way it is mounted is a horrible design and a nightmare to hang do yourself a favor and make a template to help with hang, also I had to add other supports and screw in extra screws into the shelf itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only four stars merely because I have not been able to put it up on the wall yet to see how solid or easy it is to affix
customer_reviews.text: Weathered Oak. Only four stars merely because I have not been able to put it up on the wall yet to see how solid or easy it is to affix. But the packaging was great, bit messy with the styrofoam but secure. Putting it together was easy. Only issue was securing the plastic screw covers. Very impressed with the textured finish. Was not expecting that. It looks an feels like real wood but is MDF. Love the weathered color, the size is very good for my needs. Overall this has been a really great purchase. I am so glad I did not get a cheaper corner shelf. I think this one is the worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: FRAOCH

customer_reviews.title: Compact shipping!
customer_reviews.text: We have a toddler and were looking for a DVD shelf we could hang up out of her reach and this fit the bill beautifully! So well in fact that this is the second one we ordered. It's easy to put together and hang up. And they ship to Hawaii! All in all an excellent purchase and we will most assuredly keep it in mind for future shelving needs.
customer_reviews.author: Trillian Skinner

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this product. The build quality is great and very easy to put together. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ray

customer_reviews.title: We put it in the bedroom instead and it works great for putting small novels and framed photos on instead ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our bathroom, and quickly discovered it was visually much too big (despite having measured the space). We put it in the bedroom instead and it works great for putting small novels and framed photos on instead of a bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: tmb

customer_reviews.title: Poor fitment.  Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Just got around to installing this purchase. While I am not expecting artisan quality materials, I do expect that it was manufactured with some level of precision. Each of the square boards when attached to the quarter circle shelve were not flush at the edge, often with almost a 1/16" difference in hole distance to edge for the same board! This may seem like a petty variance to be upset about, but when you consider that each board is off, and the shelve is 48.5" long it adds up. Specifically, to the tune of 1/2" at the bottom perpendicular mount location. I hope this saves some one else the installation pain that I just went through.
customer_reviews.author: PowerKjeil

customer_reviews.title: ... and display a few collectibles and it is really nice. The look is very contemporary and really accents ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to organize and display a few collectibles and it is really nice. The look is very contemporary and really accents our living room. There were a few issues though; -the drywall anchors were very flimsy and broke on us, we had to get ones from home depot to attach it -the screw covers (to conceal the screws) did not attach to the screws securely and kept falling off -The packing had a very cheap quality styrofoam which had shredded all over the product and we had to use a static brush to wipe them off carefully But overall the product is very nice! If you can overlook these issues, it looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't read the fine print. It is a lot smaller than I expected. The shelves are not very big, but my son LOVES it. He put it together and had no problem. That's saying something for a 14 year old with very little experience in assembling anything other than an egg sandwich or a laptop. It looks great on the wall and we are attaching a clip on light for reading by his bed. Fits the nook we had very nicely. We didn't even use the assembly directions. Come with all the necessary hardware and an allen wrench. We used a cordless drill and it was effortless. Would definitely buy again if we need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Pargie

customer_reviews.title: It works structurally, and is easily integrable.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed kind of gimmicky, and my wife was on the fence about it. Arrived in a slightly smaller than cubic-foot box. Then I put it together and procrastinated about where to place it for a couple weeks. Totally unnecessary to stress about putting it up; AFTER assembly (in which state it isn't super strong), it hangs with just 2 screws with drywall anchors+screws. It went up today, and it's pretty snazzy. Good for keeping small things in the corner, but it's a tight radius. It'll be as tasteful as the room you put it in, and the things you put on it. Cool Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: The shelf is easy to put together and looks nice and feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is easy to put together and looks nice and feels sturdy. The drywall anchors and screws that it came with were complete garbage so we had to get different ones. But the real reason it only got three stars: the height of the shelves is about 1 cm too short to accommodate a standard size paperback book! I bought this to go at the foot of my daughters bed and was very disappointed that she couldn't stand a couple books up on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elison

customer_reviews.title: bath salts in a pretty crystal bowl of reasonable weight
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous in bath corner wall,heavy duty if proper anchers are used(research,as u may need to hit hardware store).I have heavy crystal mouthwash decanter on one shelf,bath salts in a pretty crystal bowl of reasonable weight,& plant on another shelf,very sturdy-if proper anchers used for what ever substraght/wall board/studs u have.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and unique - wood quality isn't the best.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble. Not sure this shelf is worth $40 like I've seen on some other sites so I'm glad I got it here with prime for less. Definitely a nice and interesting way to display our items. Also, anchors for wall are absolutely necessary as the chances of the wall/item being a perfect 90 degree angle are slim. If you screw the pieces together too tightly the grain covering will lift and crack (however, I sort of expected this might be the case due to quality of wood - any time I have to use an Allen's wrench I'm leery). Once it's up it looks nice and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elese Morrone

customer_reviews.title: Unique looking alternative to everyday shelf
customer_reviews.text: Good: -Feels Sturdy -Once you get assembly started, pretty logical and simple -Unique looking; different from the everyday, ho-hum bookshelf Bad: -If your corners aren't near 90 degrees, then it will have gaps and won't sit flat on wall/s -Not sure about weight support b/c only has (2) mount points -Supplied wallmount screws went right thru pre-bored mount holes, so I had to hunt for screws w/ big enough heads
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you want to work extra hard to make this product work for you.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf may work well, BUT THE STUPID HORRIBLE PIECE OF CRAP ANCHORS THEY GIVE YOU THAT YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO PUT IN THE WALL BEFORE INSTALLING THE FINISHED (put together) PRODUCT DO NOT WORK AND I HAD TO GO AND BUY MY OWN MORE SUITIBLE ANCHORS THAT STUCK. And the screw covers DON’T stay in without SUPER GLUE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vess

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive design
customer_reviews.text: I bought thid corner shelf for my husband's mancave and he loves it!...Easy to assemble, functional and attractive. He liked it so much he asked that I order a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Lady T.

customer_reviews.title: This shelf system is really a nice setup. Perfect way to organize smaller items in ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf system is really a nice setup. Perfect way to organize smaller items in a space constrained area. Lots of shelves without being obtrusive in room. Easy to assemble, secures tightly to wall, looks great. We really like the way this looks. Wish the shelves had more room between them, but otherwise we love this. Would not put too much weight on it though, but perfect for knick knacks and such.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh145

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Took some time for my husband to install but it's really sturdy. The corner of my office is not a perfect 90 angle but since the shelf is black you can't really notice the gap between the shelf and the wall because of the shadow. My boss liked that we only had to make two holes in the wall to install. I love that I have a place for my photo frames at work with out them taking up desk space!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t say it’s necessarily going to help w storage but more for displaying small items and decoration
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my home decor!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Zig Zag Wall Shelf! It came completely disassembled, but was very easy to put together. The instructions were SUPER simple, and practically fool proof! I mounted it on my wall without any problem. The only thing, and I should have looked at this myself first, is that the space between the shelves is rather small, approximately 7.5 inches. This is great for books, picture frames, candles...etc. I had hoped to put a plant or two on the shelves, and have found this difficult, but otherwise, I love it!! Highly recommended...I might even want to purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Crap directions, run of the mill particle board
customer_reviews.text: Instructions make no mention of how to actually mount it on the wall, going so far as to even show a picture of a drill X'd out. The directions would lead you to believe that maybe you use the screw to start the hole, and then hammer in the anchor. Nope, therein lies nothing but broken, useless drywall anchors and frustration. Ignore the crap directions, drill pilot holes, and expect to have to glue on the screw top covers included because those also don't stay attached as they promise.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, missing pieces, peel on wood on top of particle board
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply constructed, peel on wood on top of super cheap particle board. Mine was thrown in a box with absolutely no padding or anything to protect it during the shipping process. I received it and it was missing a whole board, the wood stick on was peeling on multiple corners of different pieces, and way overpriced for this poor quality item.
customer_reviews.author: S. Innes

customer_reviews.title: CHIPPED AREAS AND NO RESPONSIVE SELLER
customer_reviews.text: I received this and noticed several chipped areas where the wood peeled off as I took it out of the package! I also tried to contact the seller SEVERAL times about a discount or a return label and was ignored. I DO NOT Recommend this seller or product. Definitely not worth 40 dollars with damaged material and worst of all NO RESPONSE.
customer_reviews.author: BrijP

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for corner shelving on either side of my wood-burning ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for corner shelving on either side of my wood-burning fireplace. I bought four sets, and joined two for each side - it meant drilling an extra hole in two of the boards for secure hanging, but it worked very smoothly. Easy to put together with the tool provided; just used a small hammer to tap in the nail covers.
customer_reviews.author: shophm0311

customer_reviews.title: Pieces do not fit
customer_reviews.text: Finished putting it all together and then tried to put the screw covers on and NONE fit. Called the company and they told “oh it’s a known problem” well why not fix your problem and make a customer happy. Worst unknowledgeable customaer service asked for a supervisor who has yet to call me back. Will never buy another Dayna B product again and neither will my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than I expected color wise. . .
customer_reviews.text: Also I didn't realize when I first ordered it that there are only two edges per board that are laminate and smooth and that the other two edges would be raw (unlaminate, without overlay that matches the rest of the board). The way that the shelves are set up makes hiding these raw edges nearly impossible. . . I personally don't have a desire for the raw edge to show, because I think this looks tacky and cookie cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Tylee

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Fun To Look At!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is pretty awesome! It is good quality and gives my boring corner a little extra eye candy. Keep in mind when assembled it is about 4.5ft long. The shelf fits nice and snug in the corner. It was delivered very quickly. I'm glad i made the purchase! If you need a little extra shelf space and have a empty corner go for it.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool shelf. It was a request from a good friend of mine and I wasn't sure it would be that great. When I saw it installed, it looks wonderful and she loves it. The other nice thing is, because it hangs on the wall, she can utilize the room below it for something else and still have the convenience of a book shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Suep

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but small
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea, but smaller than I expected. Obviously I didn’t read the dimensions correctly. A tad difficult to assemble, and the shelves will only hold one small object (like a Funko-Pop for example).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this shelf!  Was not that horrible to put together!
customer_reviews.text: So, it definitely has to be put together...after I read the reviews I was hesitant. My husband and I are NOT handy folks. However, this was not horrible to put together or mount. LOVE that it comes w/ screw covers! It looks great in our office/2nd bedroom. It holds his work memorabilia, and we have no worries about it falling! I looks more expensive then what we paid, so we are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to stack one on top of the other. They are in the nursery and they look great. I had no trouble assembling them and the installation was also fairly painless. I think they may have not been completely straight up and down because they wouldn't seat completely flat when I anchored them to the wall. But now that they are installed, it really isn't noticeable. I would buy another if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: But i love the way it looks in my living room
customer_reviews.text: This came in 11 pieces. Assembly was awkward. I thought I had it assembled perfectly, so i mounted it. And it was bowed in the middle. No idea how! But i love the way it looks in my living room. Might order a second too, my husband camr home and said he really liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good shelf, not what I expected though
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shelf though it is not quite what I expected. I thought the shelves would have a bit more space
customer_reviews.author: CBrown

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality item
customer_reviews.text: Very weak and not easy to assemble not sturdy ..not reccomend buying this
customer_reviews.author: Mayaanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own anchors
customer_reviews.text: Shelf came in box, nicely packed. Put together in a matter of mins with supplied screwed and L wrench. Very light and able to mount without struggle. Word to the wise, buy your own anchor as the supplied one went through the drywall. Does not anchor itself properly. Other than that awesome. If you are buying this as a "bookshelf" regular size books will not fit, but candles and other items will without issue.
customer_reviews.author: lVlAXX

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it made from particle board. Very heavy. Not really functional
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: gets a lot of comments
customer_reviews.text: This item had a few nicks even though I ordered it new. I had to find a new location as the wall wasn't straight at its intended location. Because of how long it is the wall corner needs to be perfect
customer_reviews.author: A. Karamchandani

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and functionality of this little shelf! Great in the bathroom. 4 stars because it came out a little wonky, as many put it together yourself things do. Also, the drywall anchors are a little cheap. Overall though it is a great addition to our bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wall shelf
customer_reviews.text: If you're using this for books, just know they will likely have to be laid down sideways. However, if anchored well into the wall it can hold quite a stack of books. I do a lot of reading and that is what I purchased this for. Other than that it is nice looking, good quality and easy to put together. The picture is pretty true to the color.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time, very easy to assemble. I ordered two, both of them are not right-angle when you put on right-angle corners. I suggest not to put very heavy stuff, the shelf itself is very heavy already.
customer_reviews.author: Yangmei Duane

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelf for small items
customer_reviews.text: Quality is about what you should expect from an inexpensive shelving unit. I didn't have trouble putting it together but the pre-drilled holes were not always aligned quite right so a few of the pieces are not flush against the wall, which I was concerned about. Once I put it up though its not really noticeable so not a huge issue. Size-wise it was great for me - I specifically wanted some extra space to display some decorative items in a fairly small room. It definitely isn't big enough to use for a lot of storage, just trinkets, candles, small picture frames etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Order came very quickly, well packaged, the assemble was fast and easy , look beautiful on my wall sooooo love it❤❤❤❤❤❤❤ n great price i recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kris Candelario

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble but needed my husband to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble but needed my husband to hold it in place while I drilled it into the wall. It looks wonderful in our living room. I have plaster and sheet rock walls and it went up easily. The only thing that I wish was that the compartments or cubbies spaces were a bit taller. Other than that, it is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf!
customer_reviews.text: This looks much less chintzy than I thought it would. Nice woodgrain and color. We got a dark brown one, and from a distance it pretty much looks like wood (although the domed screw covers don't look great). Easy to put together and attach to the wall with drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: K. MIller

customer_reviews.title: Good space savor
customer_reviews.text: Item was perfect to fit in this weird corner of the room and holds a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to put together and hang. Only problem i had with it is did not fit flush in the corner. Found out in most houses the corners are not perfect. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AL KRAI

customer_reviews.title: Did not have all parts
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to put together as it did not come with the necessary tool to use on the screws. Thankfully after 40 min of searching through our tools I found something that worked because it is a pain to return things on Amazon. Be prepared for the worst case scenario I experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barsky

customer_reviews.title: ... pic of him it looks jst awsome i sooo love it will buy another one for my bathroom true ...
customer_reviews.text: Got two of this for my son's room to put one in each corner next to the crib in the mirtle a pic of him it looks jst awsome i sooo love it will buy another one for my bathroom true white sooo looovee it got some complements
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice in my living room. Glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little corner piece.
customer_reviews.text: Im so pleased with this practical but decorative corner shelving. It changes the whole room! Perfect for my CDs, DVDs, and ornaments. No more wasted corner space. Lots of nice comments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble and stronger than I expected. It was a little smaller than my wife had envisioned, but now we feel it’s just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Roblero

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small collection of figures that I wasn't to display but needed a corner shelf. This worked out perfectly. It was easy to build and install on my own, though I probably should have used a little help as it was awkward to hold it up and get the nails in.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Liebrand

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad!!
customer_reviews.text: A decent enough piece for the price. Cheap particle board, but you won't know the difference once it is up- Not for anything heavy, like books, but good enough to keep light knickknacks. Looks decent enough- Do not over tighten when assembling!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN ONLY MAKE A FIRST IMPRESSION ONCE
customer_reviews.text: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. THIS IS A PIECE OF JUNK FROM THE HARDWARE TO THE PRESSBOARD. AT $10 IT WOULD BE A FAIR DEAL. LOOKS OK ON THE WALL, FROM A DISTANCE BUT A REAL PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: alan liebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works for what is needed
customer_reviews.text: It's not very large. You'll only be able to fit a small vase or a little picture frame on it but it's cute and good for the price. Don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin McEwan

customer_reviews.title: stylish and sturdy. A lot smaller that I thought but its ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, stylish and sturdy. A lot smaller that I thought but its ok for the small space it went into.
customer_reviews.author: Rita's Pic

customer_reviews.title: Corner Shelves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to put in opposite corners of my living room behind the couch. They were easy to assemble and look great. They are really a nice way to display my woodcarvings that I have collected. I get compliments on them all of the time and everyone wants to know where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: MunkyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute, but spunky
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf because its cute but still a little spunky so your living room doesn't look so cookie cutter! It was a little difficult to put together but after I figured that out it was sturdy and hasnt fallen apart at all!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I'd get another!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great against dark walls. A lot of comments from guests!
customer_reviews.author: Tigereye

customer_reviews.title: I bought the big one and they gave me the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the big one and they gave me the smaller one. I have already put it in my wall when I realized, and I am not going to take it out now to return it. I feel stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice!! Everyone loves
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTLEY LOVE this item! Easy to assemble... But for heads up be careful upon measuring and marking the whole inserts, before hanging on wall!
customer_reviews.author: Khiana Fox

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, A little over priced...
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice little shelf. I got it because I wanted a a shelf to put a surround sound speaker on. This did the trick just fine. It didn't fit perfectly flush into the corner. This could be the shelf or the house. The house is brand new so I am thinking its probably the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: These are made well and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are made well and easy to assemble. No shortage of parts or problems when put together. Fits a corner tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: This wall shelf looks very neat and is quite long that what I initially thought. It was very easy to assemble it and came with all the required hardware. The instructions could have been a little more detailed. Because of the way this shelf is normally positioned in a house (Corner walls) it would be very difficult to find a stud to hang this and because of that it comes supplied with a drywall mount. But I would have preferred a screw type mount rather than the one which i would need to hammer in.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: wood look corner shelves
customer_reviews.text: These shelves fit perfectly in the corner, they look great and are very practical use of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: This corner shelf looks great. The shelves are a little smaller than I had thought, so it doesn't provide a ton of storage, but it's great for little decorative things you don't want taking up valuable dresser space. I posted a picture on instagram after we hung ours, and all my friends asked where I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Maci

customer_reviews.title: very low quality!
customer_reviews.text: this would be a very nice looking, easy to assemble piece, however, it is obviously shoddily mass-produced and even basic quality is lost. I opened the box to find a trim piece already coming off of a shelf and when i attempted assembly, the pieces weren't even predrilled correctly and wouldn't line up. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: delores abernathy

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Needed shelving to keep my daughter out of our media collection. Holding up well and was easy to put together. I like this a lot! Space saver too for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy Lynette Daubner

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for its size and upon assembly, realized it contained only 7 out of its 11 prices (only 63% of it's advertised size). Didn't get what I paid for. And now I cannot return it because it has been partially assembled? Informing my friends who also thought this looked great... Online that is. Very dissatisfied, especially for how much I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Put it daughters room in a corner, looks nice and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ski

customer_reviews.title: Returned item
customer_reviews.text: Item is cheap. The screw holes didn't come drilled deep enough, not worth the re-work. I like the design but not worth the hour or more needed to put together. Returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Sdodd0002

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this, there are some cheaper versions out there but this was well worth the extra 10 bucks
customer_reviews.author: gmjw

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in my bedroom. Modern and stylish but not over done. Perfect for candles, pictures, or plants. They were however very hard to put together. You almost need two people to hold the one side while the other attaches them together. Also they come with screws to attach to the wall but I wasn't sure if it would hold much weight at all. They weren't very long to go into studs. I bought my own that were longer. It works great with the ones I used.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Looks really awesome, but difficult to put together and hang
customer_reviews.text: Looks really awesome, but difficult to put together and hang. My fiance put it together for me because he is great at building things, but it does not fit into the wall at a 90 degree angle. We had to install extra supports for it because the kit it came with to hang it on a wall was not sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture! It was not easy to put together or to attach to wall. Got a little frustrated with that but I've had great compliments on it & I rearrange things on their often from books to pictures, etc... It's fun! Great for my office!
customer_reviews.author: Amazzoning🤷🏻‍♀️

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality screws
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my living room. The shelf is good however the screws and L key provided in 2 nd shelf were of very poor quality. The L would fit into some but not others. I had to use different screws and key to put this together which was exhausting and painful experience. I wish the manufacturer would spend and extra dollar to buy better screws and L key
customer_reviews.author: Raj Singh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great corner piece in my office and bedroom. I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I love it I love the design the only thing its ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it I love the design the only thing its to small in between shelves but it look amazing and it last i but it two years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! We used this to hide tv cords for a corner mounted TV, placing it in between the TV and the stand. Had to use spacer boards at top and bottom in order to accomplish this, and it worked perfectly for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great use of corners
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. Fits in hardly used corners and I ended up putting a bunch of dragon figures on it. Pretty easy to assemble if I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Elenaire

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: People were complaining about there being no directions or issues with way it assembled. I had no issues. Everything was intact, had instructions, and was easy to assemble - would recommend to others. Great product
customer_reviews.author: c0nker TM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great way to find out which corners in your house aren't true 90° angles. LOL! I love the shelf ... even found a properly formed corner in the house to put it in. :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Christian

customer_reviews.title: These shelves are Ryan-Approved.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and the shelves look great. I had to use my own tools because the screws were difficult to tighten with the provided tools but other than that, assembly and installation was very simple. As mentioned in other reviews, some of the shelves don't align perfectly with the wall but it's hardly noticeable at least in my case - I'm sure it varies depending on the angle of your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: 4 shelves
customer_reviews.text: I left off one of the shelves because it didn't have holes drilled. I have 4 shelves, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome shelving unit for the corner of my room. Very easy to assemble. The little covering for the screws are not that great but overall i am very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Ross Barnes

customer_reviews.title: When installed it looked like it grew there
customer_reviews.text: When installed it looked like it grew there. Very positive. Excellent construction. This is the second one purchased for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Patterson fan

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Eh, its not a high end shelf for sure. Mounted easy. It is way to short for where I wanted to put it, maybe with 2 of them it would look better. The shelves are really small, cant fit much on them.
customer_reviews.author: JJams

customer_reviews.title: Looks really beautiful when hanged on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks really beautiful when hanged on the wall. Everyone who came to our house gave us a complement. The only thing that I did not like about it, is its assembly with screws that are not fine at all. But they will be covered by the small round plastic pieces provided. Overall I recommend buying this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Not satisified wit this item
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any instructions, the screws and tools needed to assemble did not come with the item, had to purchase them myself. The assembly was easy but had to remake the holes due to poor measurement on the manufacturer part. Gaps are noticeable if you are close the shelves..I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but needs more support
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this -- definitely not built to hold heavy objects as other people have said. The shelves are supported only by 1 nail on he top panel and 1 on the bottom. Would be better with more support in the middle to brace to the wall...
customer_reviews.author: SwanhaPA

customer_reviews.title: Watch the screw caps.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy enough and is sturdy, but the little plastic plugs for the screw heads don't work at all. I used some temporary adhesive to get them to stay on. Overall a nice addition for holding smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: David Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Its microscopic
customer_reviews.text: Funny thing is the title says LARGE SHELF... it should just say LONG Shelf. I should have looked closer to see what they actually had on the shelf before buying. Did I mention its microscopic. The quality is nice, the fit is petty good... but its not close to being large.
customer_reviews.author: taus

customer_reviews.title: These are very stylish, but the height of compartments ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very stylish, but the height of compartments were very awkward for us. It was too short for our taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cylee

customer_reviews.title: If you use tools no problems at all! Very cool item!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I think, have these people ever put anything together? I guess its just the generation these days. Had it on the wall in 10 min max. Built well and simple enough. Im buying another to match the other wall.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and looks great in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Khalilah Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Sturdy. All parts were with it. No dings, scratches, or cracks. Easy to assemble. Looks good hanging up. I would purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: twilite2000Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Office Bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: The shelf met our needs for a decorative addition to our medical office restroom. It is the perfect size and allows us to add some softer touches to an otherwise sterile-looking room. It also allows us not to lose any floor space which might conflict with the wheel-chair accessibility rules of the ADA specifications. It was good that they included the tools and diagram for the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I though that it would be but is built nicely. It's been mounted on my wall with heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as "large" as I though that it would be but is built nicely. It's been mounted on my wall with heavy stuff on top of it and no complaints or whatsoever. It stays on the corner wall nicely/
customer_reviews.author: a4rvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and hang and they look great..would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Teen has too much and needed space
customer_reviews.text: Best invention for a corner. Have varies items that we had no idea where to put but this shelf fixed that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L.

product_meta.title: Danya B Decorative Floating Shelf Units, Rustic Shelf Organizer for Home Furnishings, 5 Tier Corner Shelf, Great for Living Room, Kitchen, Office, and More (Walnut)
product_meta.description: Color:WalnutDecorative corner wall shelves makes space utilization possible from any corner. Creative design and space saving solution for small areas. Display collectibles, photos, toys, awards, CD's, videos, decorative items and more. Attaches to both sides of the wall with only 2 nails or screws. MDF & laminate. With its contemporary walnut finish, they are the ideal accent for any living space. Minor assembly is required.
feature_bullets: WOOD SHELVING FOR ANY ROOM: This Danya B Large Rustic Decorative Wall Mount Corner Shelf unit is an excellent addition to any room in your home. From the bedroom and bathroom to the living room and kitchen, this beautiful shelf is a great way to store pictures and other home accessories while also providing a beautiful accent piece.

BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY SHELF: These mounted wooden shelves not only make for a beautiful addition to your wall decor, but they also provide convenient storage space with their large storage potential. From your precious family photos to timeless heirloom knick knacks, these 5 tier shelves will hold it all.

CONTEMPORARY CORNER DESIGN: Although floating shelves are already a striking design element on their own, these shelves take it to the next level. With their geometric design, this 5-shelf unit creates a minimalistic yet elegant feel for you to display pictures, books, or any other small decorative items.

INTERSECTING SHELVES: With their unique intersecting corners and lines, these Decorative Wall Mount Shelves provide additional stability and convenience when it comes to storing and hanging your shelves. Installation is quick and easy with all necessary hanging hardware and instructions included. Make sure that the storage shelf and organizer unit is mounted flush to the wall corner.

PERFECT FOR PHOTOS & KNICK KNACKS: From family portraits to interesting conversation pieces, this set of five shelves helps you to display all your home decor with ease and class rather than having to turn to traditional shelves, bins, or drawers. While these shelves may look delicate, they have a heavy-duty capacity that allows you to safely store your home accessories.
